page.title: 19ECOLOGY CONTINUED
page.content: Clyst St Lawrence was named after a man called Lawrence who was the second Arch Bishop of Canterbury and was thought to be a martyr and was roasted alive.About ten years later he was named a saint .The bridge that goes across the river has a deliberate dent in one side,for pedestrians to stand in. The other side was knocked down. Mount Pleasant cottage used to be a abatoir. Willis cottage used to be a thatcher. Upton farm which dates back to 1270 and has a big oak door with iron studs sticking out.
